name: odp-plus
description: Serverless P2P multiplayer for Just Dance Now.

scripts.start: npm run build && web-ext run --source-dir dist --url "https://justdancenow.com"
scripts.build: tsc && shx mkdir -p dist/js/bundle && esbuild dist/js/inject-redirect.js --bundle --outfile=dist/js/bundle/inject-redirect.js && esbuild dist/js/redirect.js --bundle --outfile=dist/js/bundle/redirect.js && shx mkdir -p dist/js/deps && shx cp node_modules/webextension-polyfill/dist/browser-polyfill.min.js dist/js/deps/browser-polyfill.js && shx cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && shx cp src/popup.html dist/popup.html && shx rm -rf dist/css && shx cp -r src/css dist/css && shx rm -rf dist/img && shx cp -r img dist/img
scripts.watch: npm run build; while inotifywait -r src; do npm run build; done
scripts.check: npm run build && npm run lint && npx prettier@3.3.3 --check . && tsc && echo 'No errors'
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run build && shx mkdir -p ../ODP_Release/ && cd dist && zip -r "../../ODP_Release/odp-plus-v2.0".zip .

author: ODP+ Contributors
